emails.subject: Re: PT Interindo PO#2408014-10PL | ETA SIN 10/09/24 | ETA JAKARTA 13/09/24 | AN HAI
emails.content: Dear All, Here are the new pic list. thank you On Thu, Mar 27, 2025 at 12:42 PM ShippingCoordinator <msgubts@gmail.com> wrote: Dear Juliet, Thank you for reaching out regarding the latest vessel
actionItems: Update picklist based on customer's new list
Confirm updated delivery dates in response to the vessel delay
answers: There are no specific procedures for updating picklists in response to customer changes found in the available documents. It is advised to consult relevant operational guidelines or contact the appropriate department for detailed procedures.

For updating delivery dates due to vessel delays, it is important to monitor the estimated time of arrival (ETA) of the vessel and check the container release status. Updates should be communicated through systems like PortNet or notifications via email, carrier's website, or phone calls. Delivery schedule adjustments should be communicated promptly to all relevant parties.
